description: <p>If you are passionate about providing expert and compassionate care, join the team at Sue Ryder's Stagenhoe Neurologcal Care Centre and we'll ensure your job as Care Assistant makes you feel incredible too! With flexible working hours and an excellent personalised training programme this is a wonderful opportunity to develop your skills as a Care Assistant in the specialist field of neurological care.<br /><br />Stagenhoe is a Sue Ryder specialist neurological care centre based in Hertfordshire, caring for people aged 18 and over a range of neurological conditions. At Stagenhoe, we provide the care people need to optimise their health and wellbeing, maximise their independence and support their emotional and social needs.<br /><br />Responsibilities:<br /><br />• To promote choice in the delivery of care and support. Reviewing and making suggestions to enhance the individuals’ experience.<br />• To ensure accurate reporting and documentation.<br />• To participate in care planning implementation and review.<br />• To promote the values, build morale and encourage others to perform to high standards<br /><br />The correct candidate will demonstrate a compassionate and caring nature alongside flexibility with excellent people skills and be a team player. Successful applicants must have recent experience in the delivery of care in a similar environment and have or be willing to gain an NVQ 2 in health and social care.<br /><br />Sue Ryder offer a large range of benefits and pay enhancements including:<br /><br />Enhancements:<br />8.00 pm to 6.00 am (nights) 30%<br />Friday midnight to Sunday midnight (weekends) 45%<br />Public Holidays 24 hours midnight to midnight 60%<br /><br />Benefits:<br />• 25 days holiday rising to 30 with service plus bank holidays<br />• Private pension matched at 5%<br />• Enhanced Maternity Benefits<br />• Cash referral bonus scheme for certain roles<br />• Carers leave policy<br />• 24 hour employee assistance line for free advice on work, family and personal life<br />• PeoplePerks - discounts with hundreds of retailers and services that can amount to an average annual saving of GBP 350<br />• Staff discount of 15% on new goods at the online shop<br />• Free onsite parking and good transport links<br />• Susidised meals<br />• Staff loans and company car loans<br />• Free uniform<br />• Wellbeing centre and free will writing service<br />• Opportunities to progress through our development framework structure<br /><br />Stagenhoe Park is located 8 miles outside Hitchin in the village of St Paul's Walden. Due to its location access to your own transport is required.<br /><br />To learn more about joining this amazing team and becoming a Sue Ryder Care Assistant, please apply now or get in touch.</p>
title: Care Assistant
